casebody.data:
IN the INTEREST OF: M.K.G. and B.N.H., Plaintiffs, Juvenile Officer, Respondent,
v.
A.S. (Mother); Appellant, M.G. (Father); Respondent, D.H. (Father), Respondent. WD 80708 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: March 20, 2018 Henry Service, Kansas City, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Claire Terrebonne, Kansas City, MO, Counsel for Plaintiffs. Ashley Irwin, Grain Valley, MO, Counsel for Respondent, D.H. Samuel Barnett, Kansas City, MO, Counsel for Respondent, M.G. Edward Moore, Kansas City, MO, Counsel for Respondent, Juvenile Officer. Bree Sturner, Kansas City, MO, Co-Counsel for Respondent, Juvenile Officer. Before Division Two: James Edward Welsh, P.J., Alok Ahuja, and Anthony Rex Gabbert, JJ.

ORDER

Per Curiam:

A.S. appeals the circuit court's judgment terminating her parental rights to her two daughters, M.K.G. and B.N.H., pursuant to section 211.447, RSMo. We affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
